title: Election Infrastructure Capture Coordination
description: Systematic documentation of election official targeting, fake elector schemes, and voting system capture efforts. Identified 170 pattern instances showing coordinated attempts to control election infrastructure.
research_questions: What are the specific mechanisms used for election infrastructure capture?
Who are the key actors coordinating election official targeting?
What timeline evidence exists for systematic voting system manipulation?
How do fake elector schemes connect to broader election subversion efforts?
Which states and jurisdictions show evidence of election infrastructure capture?
source_analysis: Trump Tyranny Tracker Batch 1 Analysis - 170 election infrastructure patterns identified across 45 articles
